summary: This is an email from an individual named Alex, sent on December 20, 2019, scheduling a call for December 23, 2019. The sender argues that a person (whose name is redacted) was and is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein and aims to convince the recipient's team of this during the call. The sender's office address is provided.

persons.name: Alex
persons.context: The sender of the email who is scheduling a call to discuss how a redacted individual was a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator from whom a redacted individual is claimed to be a victim.

connections.description: The email claims the redacted individual was and is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.
Alex is advocating on behalf of the redacted individual, claiming they are a victim of Epstein.

events.title: Scheduled Call Regarding Epstein Victim
events.description: A call is scheduled for 3 PM EST between Alex and the recipient's team to discuss the claim that a redacted individual is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

locations.context: The office address of the email sender, Alex.

keyFacts: An email from December 2019 argues that a specific, redacted individual was a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.
The sender, Alex, is attempting to schedule a call to convince a team of this victim status.
The correspondence indicates ongoing efforts in late 2019 to establish or argue victim narratives related to Epstein.
